_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
notes: SPY PMCC: long deep ITM Jun 560C, short OTM Apr 620C
rationale: Bullish, leveraged covered call without owning shares

entry_conditions.iv_environment: Enter when IV is LOW â€” diagonal benefits from RISING IV after entry
entry_conditions.iv_rank_preferred: below 30 (cheap long leg, sell premium as IV rises)

buy_leg.strike: ATM or ITM â€” provides stock-like exposure

sell_leg.dte_months: 1 month before buy side (30 DTE before buy expiry)
sell_leg.strike: OTM â€” provides income via theta

entry_conditions.notes: This is the monthly income playbook from the PDF. Buy long-dated ATM/ITM (50-70 delta, 3-4 months), sell short-dated OTM (30-50 delta, 1 month before buy). Theta positive, defined risk, benefits from rising IV. Can be bullish (call diagonal), bearish (put diagonal), or neutral. PMCC variant uses deep ITM LEAPS (70+ delta). Inverse diagonal: buy lower delta, sell higher delta for credit.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Short strike - long strike - net debit + front-month premium collected (if price at short strike at front expiry)
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Net debit paid (if stock moves sharply against direction)
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Theta from short leg â€” short-dated option decays faster than long-dated. Roll short leg monthly for income.
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: IV expansion â€” LONG VEGA position. Enter when IV is low, profit as IV rises. Long leg gains more than short leg from IV increase.
pnl_drivers.tertiary_driver: Directional move â€” ATM/ITM long leg appreciates from delta exposure

greeks_profile.theta: positive â€” short front-month decays faster than long back-month
greeks_profile.vega: POSITIVE â€” long vega, benefits from rising IV (enter when IV is LOW)
greeks_profile.delta: directional â€” bullish call diagonal ~+30-50 net delta, bearish put diagonal ~-30-50
greeks_profile.gamma: slightly positive â€” LEAPS has low gamma, short call has higher gamma

pnl_drivers.rolling_strategy: At front-month expiry, close or let short leg expire, sell new short leg 1 month out. Repeat for monthly income. This is the income engine.
pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Stock moves gradually in your direction. Short leg decays to near zero, rolled monthly. Long leg appreciates from delta + vega. 88% win rate on QQQ put diagonal variant (OptionsKit backtest).
